item.title: Load Testing Guidelines
item.description: Introduction Use real datasets Identify collateral damage Stub services if necessary Distribute your traffic Automate for reproducible runs Consider disabling authentication Don’t immediately scale dependencies Send traffic from different geographical regions Decide if your tool should support reusing connections Start testing a single instance, before moving onto clusters Verify load using multiple strategies Reset your environment between test runs Document the results Tools Introduction This post should serve as a guideline for running load tests.
